articles.author: Jasmine Hicks
articles.title: This site lets you listen to nature sounds from all over the world
articles.description: Earth.fm is a non-profit portal of nature sounds recorded by individuals in various locations around the world. The sounds are accumulated through different contributors, some nature recordists, and are tied to different non-profits.
articles.content:
Earth.fm brings together recordings from around the world
Earth.fm homepage
For people who love discovering new sounds, theres an intriguing new site that collects soundscapes from around the world… [+1372 chars]

articles.title: House passes first major federal gun safety legislation in decades, bill will next go to Biden for signature
articles.description: The House passed a bipartisan bill on Friday to address gun violence that amounts to the first major federal gun safety legislation in decades.
articles.content:
